attributes.action: looking to help people with non epileptic seizure
attributes.additional_details: people can have loads of seizures in a day and there is no meds out there that will work on us,is there anyway you could look into this as we classed as disabled but not many company's have heard about this and in work places can be a health and safety risk
attributes.background: non epileptic seizure is a condition loads of people live with and no one has heard of it

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to help people with non epileptic seizure.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to fund research or awareness raising with employers if that is something you would like to see happen.
